channel.title: PayPal
channel.description:
Hey. I got a questions. My parents, well mum, doesn't want to let me put her bank number onto paypal... Basically, I got the O.K to buy Counterstrike:Source. But, I have no way to get it. No shops have it, our family doesn't have a credit/master card, nor visa.. No American Express.. So our only option was PayPal. But, I can't even get money on to it.
I have the money to buy Counterstrike:Source, like as I type this I can see a $50 note in my drawyer. I just can't get the money to the place I need to buy it from :(:(.

item.title: PayPal

item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Google ‘PayPal scam’

Read full topic

Well, I’ll try it.

Read full topic

item.title: PayPal
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yeah,
also because my bank wont work with paypal, i have to use my mums account, but she is always weary with putting her credit card details in on the computer, just show her the Padlock sign in the corner of the browser, tell her its a big company handling the details, they would not rob you because a big company like that would go down if they were caught stealing.

Just try show how big paypal is, show how many sites use it EG: ebay.

Considering my mum is computer illiterate, i could say ‘put your credit card details in here’
*I charge her card £1000’s
iWin.

Read full topic

Get your own bank account and put that?

Lol, wtf. Why do no shops sell CS:S. Where do you live? You can’t magically get the $50 in to your PayPal lol
